snippet.title: Potion Problem Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2862360/Potion_Problem/

Potion Problem is a whimsical potion making puzzler about discovery, problem solving and potions! Create potions and fulfill orders, prepare bizarre ingredients and learn the deepest secrets of the alchemists world.

Stay updated with the latest Potion Problem news on social media.
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/potionproblem/
Twitter/X - https://twitter.com/PotionProblem

Potion Problem's music is composed by Amanda Cawley - https://www.instagram.com/amandacawleymusic/
